title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Sep 30 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Sep 30 2022
description:
Hurricane Ian recovery and what to look for next. Clay says, "I would bet, unfortunately, if it's not gonna happen today, certainly by Monday the conversation will shift from the hurricane itself to trying to score political points." Emotional caller who survived Ian in Florida. C&B on kids. Buck describes his happy and informative regular visits with his lively 2-year-old nephew. Reflective Clay notes, "I've said for a while I'd like to hit the pause button right now on my kids' ages." Trevor Noah out at The Daily Show after 7 unfunny years and no viewers. YouTube pulls C&B's interview with President Trump from July, citing "election misinformation." C&B give valuable points as to why all viewpoints should always be heard.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
